.ROTATE() Syntax .ROTATE( Bits as N ) ArgumentDescription BitsThe number of bits to rotate the variable's data.
Description The .ROTATE() method rotates the bits of a binary variable. Example dim b as B b = "alpha software" ? b.dump("a") = "alpha software. " b.rotate(8) ? b.dump("a") = ".alpha software " b.rotate(8) ? b.dump("a") = "e.alpha softwar " dim b as B b = "alpha software" ? b.dump("a") = "alpha software. " b.rotate(-8) ? b.dump("a") = "lpha software.a "
